data.title: Who Is Craig Bohl Wife Leia Bohl? Meet The Wyoming Football Head Coach On Twitter
data.meta_description: 63-year old Wyoming head coach Craig Bohl is the husband of radio host Lia Bohl. Under the leadership of American football coach Craig Bohl, the Wyoming Cowboys are seeing exponential growth in their performance.
data.text:
63-year old Wyoming head coach Craig Bohl is the husband of radio host Lia Bohl.

Under the leadership of American football coach Craig Bohl, the Wyoming Cowboys are seeing exponential growth in their performance.

His competitive nature helped the team win Idaho Potato Bowl.

Grinning with joy, his students showered him with french fries as a way to celebrate their triumph.

Former Bison coach Craig Bohl gets the french fry bath after winning the Famous Idaho Potato Bowl. Heâs puts on some sweet moves as well â¦ pic.twitter.com/6fAayQa8R1

â Joshua A. Swanson (@Swany8) December 22, 2021

Table of Contents

Craig Bohl blissfully married his wife, Leia Bohl. She is a well-known radio personality under the pseudo name Ryan kelly.

The couple said their vows in an intimate ceremony in 2010.

They are parents to a teenage son named Elijah. When asked about her child by inforum, she admitted that she got the best of both worlds.

Indeed, she got to be a wife and a mother while still focusing on her career.

Besides, she gets to go on vacation with her spouse when he has an international game.

Nevertheless, she is living the dream life of every career woman.

Wyoming coach Craig Bohl and his wife Leia are donating $100K to Wyoming to cover the costs of scholarships for all spring sports seniors who want to return in 2021 after their 2020 seasons were canceled. https://t.co/kPAdh92jLE pic.twitter.com/LVRWaC7Ybd

â Yahoo Sports College Football (@YahooSportsCFB) April 3, 2020

Craig Bohl Age And Wikipedia

Coach Craig Bohl was born on 27th July 1958, making him 63 years old.

He grew up in his home town Lincoln, Nebraska.

Indeed, he made his dreams into reality when he joined the Nebraska Husker in 1997.

After player for them for two years, he graduated from Nebraska University with a degree in Business.

The first NLI of the day! Welcome @theyenvyjc

San Antonio âï¸ Wyoming

âJoshua brings great size and athleticism to our Wide Receiver corps. He has a large catch radius and attacks the ball at its highest point.â

? | https://t.co/oV4VBA55HN#NSD20 | #RideForTheBrand pic.twitter.com/XTtVUIVVgi

â Wyoming Cowboy Football (@wyo_football) February 5, 2020

Is Craig Bohl On Twitter? Where Is He Now?

Craig Bohl is available on Twitter with the account handle CoachCBohl. Here, his verified account has a following of 13.8k people.

He is currently at his residence with his son and wife in Wyoming.

Like a typical football coach, his Twitter account is full of past games of his team.

Not saying much himself, he likes to retweet comments of his workplace.

As his wife said, he is a pretty private man and keeps his thoughts to himself.

Everyone knows Craig Bohl is one competitive son of a gun, so he wants to win a bowl game. I asked him what his favorite part of coming to a bowl game and his answer definitely surprised me pic.twitter.com/KraM7uwTSX

â David Graf (@mrdavidgraf) December 21, 2021

Craig Bohl Salary Explored

As of 2021, the annual salary of Craig Bohl is 1.5 million dollars. he makes his living by working as the head coach of the University of Wyoming.

After retiring from his football career, he joined Nebraska as an assistant coach. After working for eight seasons, he moved to North Dakota State.

Since then, he has worked for Tulas, Wisconson, Rice, and Duke before finally setting in Wyoming,

Furthermore, he joined the university in 2014 and continues to coach there.
